attributes.action: Ask the BBC Director General to reconsider his decision not to broadcast the DEF Appeal for Gaza victims
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: There is no question of partiality where innocent children and women as victims of the conflice are concerned. Nobody - even the most right-wing elements will accuse BBC of bias when helping innocent victims.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
